history.proof: intros f a b H. destruct H as [If Hf]. hauto lq: on depth: 3use: is_RInt_opp.

exceptions.exn: In environment V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a, b : R If : V Hf : is_RInt f a b If P : V -> Prop Unable to unify "exists eps : posreal, forall y : V, ball (opp ?M2377) eps y -> P y" with "exists eps : posreal, forall y : V, ball If eps y -> P y".
In environment V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a, b : R If : V Hf : is_RInt f a b If Unable to unify "is_RInt f a b If" with "is_RInt (fun x : R => opp (f x)) a b If".

original: intros f a b H. destruct H as [If Hf]. exists If. apply is_RInt_opp. apply Hf.
